text: Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience!
Locks the time of day to morning, allowing you to experience China in the first rays of the rising sun!
Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience! Slower passage of time than default.
Locks the time of day to evening, allowing you to experience China during the evening sunset!
Locks the time of day to midnight, allowing you to experience China beneath the ink of night!
Locks the time of day to afternoon, allowing you to experience China at the height of the day!
Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience! Faster passage of time than default.
Unlocks the time of day so that the world turns in real time to your system clock!
